channel.title: Image Segmentation on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Image Segmentation on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: AdaPKC: PeakConv with Adaptive Peak Receptive Field for Radar Semantic Segmentation
item.description: AdaPKC upgrades PeakConv for superior radar semantic segmentation by dynamically adjusting its receptive field, outperforming current state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: AUCSeg: AUC-oriented Pixel-level Long-tail Semantic Segmentation
item.description: AUCSeg tackles pixel-level long-tail semantic segmentation by introducing an AUC-oriented loss function and a Tail-Classes Memory Bank to efficiently manage memory and improve performance on imbalance…

item.title: Bidirectional Recurrence for Cardiac Motion Tracking with Gaussian Process Latent Coding
item.description: GPTrack: A novel unsupervised framework enhances cardiac motion tracking by using sequential Gaussian processes and bidirectional recurrence, improving accuracy and efficiency.

item.title: Bridge the Points: Graph-based Few-shot Segment Anything Semantically
item.description: GF-SAM: A novel graph-based few-shot semantic segmentation method leverages SAM’s power efficiently via positive-negative prompt alignment and mask clustering for superior accuracy and speed.

item.title: Continuous Spatiotemporal Events Decoupling through Spike-based Bayesian Computation
item.description: Spiking neural network effectively segments mixed-motion event streams via spike-based Bayesian computation, achieving efficient real-time motion decoupling.

item.title: CoSW: Conditional Sample Weighting for Smoke Segmentation with Label Noise
item.description: CoSW: a novel conditional sample weighting method for robust smoke segmentation, achieves state-of-the-art results by handling inconsistent noisy labels through a multi-prototype framework.

item.title: DRIP: Unleashing Diffusion Priors for Joint Foreground and Alpha Prediction in Image Matting
item.description: DRIP: A novel image matting method using pre-trained latent diffusion models achieves state-of-the-art performance by jointly predicting foreground and alpha values, significantly improving accuracy a…

item.title: E2ENet: Dynamic Sparse Feature Fusion for Accurate and Efficient 3D Medical Image Segmentation
item.description: E2ENet: A novel 3D medical image segmentation model boasts high accuracy and efficiency by dynamically fusing multi-scale features and using restricted depth-shift 3D convolutions, significantly outp…

item.title: Flaws can be Applause: Unleashing Potential of Segmenting Ambiguous Objects in SAM
item.description: A-SAM: Turning SAM’s inherent ambiguity into an advantage for controllable, diverse, and convincing ambiguous object segmentation.

item.title: GraphMorph: Tubular Structure Extraction by Morphing Predicted Graphs
item.description: GraphMorph: revolutionizing tubular structure extraction by morphing predicted graphs for superior topological accuracy.

item.title: Historical Test-time Prompt Tuning for Vision Foundation Models
item.description: HisTPT: Historical Test-Time Prompt Tuning memorizes past learning, enabling robust online prompt adaptation for vision models, overcoming performance degradation in continuously changing data streams…

item.title: Hybrid Mamba for Few-Shot Segmentation
item.description: Hybrid Mamba Network (HMNet) boosts few-shot segmentation accuracy by efficiently fusing support and query features using a novel hybrid Mamba architecture, significantly outperforming current state-o…

item.title: Improving Viewpoint-Independent Object-Centric Representations through Active Viewpoint Selection
item.description: Active Viewpoint Selection (AVS) significantly improves viewpoint-independent object-centric representations by actively selecting the most informative viewpoints for each scene, leading to better seg…

item.title: Integrating Deep Metric Learning with Coreset for Active Learning in 3D Segmentation
item.description: Deep metric learning and Coreset integration enables efficient slice-based active learning for 3D medical segmentation, surpassing existing methods in performance with low annotation budgets.

item.title: Learning Frequency-Adapted Vision Foundation Model for Domain Generalized Semantic Segmentation
item.description: FADA: a novel frequency-adapted learning scheme boosts domain-generalized semantic segmentation by decoupling style and content using Haar wavelets, achieving state-of-the-art results.

item.title: Learning Segmentation from Point Trajectories
item.description: This paper introduces a novel unsupervised video object segmentation method using long-term point trajectories and optical flow, outperforming prior art by effectively combining sparse, long-term moti…

item.title: MaskFactory: Towards High-quality Synthetic Data Generation for Dichotomous Image Segmentation
item.description: MaskFactory generates high-quality synthetic data for dichotomous image segmentation, improving model training efficiency and accuracy.

item.title: MetaUAS: Universal Anomaly Segmentation with One-Prompt Meta-Learning
item.description: MetaUAS achieves universal visual anomaly segmentation using only one normal image prompt via a pure vision model, surpassing previous zero-shot, few-shot, and full-shot methods.

item.title: Object segmentation from common fate: Motion energy processing enables human-like zero-shot generalization to random dot stimuli
item.description: Neuroscience-inspired motion energy processing enables human-like zero-shot generalization in figure-ground segmentation, outperforming deep learning models on random dot stimuli.

item.title: Recurrent Complex-Weighted Autoencoders for Unsupervised Object Discovery
item.description: SynCx, a novel recurrent autoencoder with complex weights, surpasses state-of-the-art models in unsupervised object discovery by iteratively refining phase relationships to achieve robust object bindi…

item.title: Relationship Prompt Learning is Enough for Open-Vocabulary Semantic Segmentation
item.description: Relationship Prompt Network (RPN) achieves state-of-the-art open-vocabulary semantic segmentation using only prompt learning and a Vision-Language Model (VLM), eliminating the need for expensive segme…

item.title: Rethinking Decoders for Transformer-based Semantic Segmentation: Compression is All You Need
item.description: DEPICT: A new white-box decoder for Transformer-based semantic segmentation, achieving better performance with fewer parameters by leveraging the principle of compression and connecting Transformer de…

item.title: Segment Any Change
item.description: AnyChange achieves zero-shot image change detection by adapting the Segment Anything Model (SAM) via a training-free bitemporal latent matching method, significantly outperforming previous state-of-th…

item.title: Segment Anything without Supervision
item.description: Unsupervised SAM (UnSAM) achieves competitive image segmentation results without human annotation, surpassing previous unsupervised methods and even improving supervised SAM’s accuracy.

item.title: SegVol: Universal and Interactive Volumetric Medical Image Segmentation
item.description: SegVol: A universal, interactive 3D medical image segmentation model achieving state-of-the-art performance across diverse anatomical categories.

item.title: SlimSAM: 0.1% Data Makes Segment Anything Slim
item.description: SlimSAM achieves near original SAM performance using 0.1% of its training data by employing a novel alternate slimming framework and disturbed Taylor pruning, significantly advancing data-efficient mo…

item.title: SSA-Seg: Semantic and Spatial Adaptive Pixel-level Classifier for Semantic Segmentation
item.description: SSA-Seg improves semantic segmentation by adapting pixel-level classifiers to the test image’s semantic and spatial features, achieving state-of-the-art performance with minimal extra computational co…

item.title: TARSS-Net: Temporal-Aware Radar Semantic Segmentation Network
item.description: TARSS-Net: A novel temporal-aware radar semantic segmentation network uses a data-driven approach to aggregate temporal information, enhancing accuracy and performance.

item.title: Toward Real Ultra Image Segmentation: Leveraging Surrounding Context to Cultivate General Segmentation Model
item.description: SGNet cultivates general segmentation models for ultra images by integrating surrounding context, achieving significant performance improvements across various datasets.

item.title: Towards Open-Vocabulary Semantic Segmentation Without Semantic Labels
item.description: PixelCLIP: Open-vocabulary semantic segmentation without pixel-level labels! Leveraging unlabeled image masks from Vision Foundation Models and an online clustering algorithm, PixelCLIP achieves imp…

item.title: Transferable Adversarial Attacks on SAM and Its Downstream Models
item.description: UMI-GRAT: A universal meta-initialized and gradient robust adversarial attack effectively exploits vulnerabilities in the Segment Anything Model (SAM) and its fine-tuned downstream models, even withou…

item.title: Understanding Multi-Granularity for Open-Vocabulary Part Segmentation
item.description: PartCLIPSeg, a novel framework, leverages generalized parts and object-level contexts to achieve significant improvements in open-vocabulary part segmentation, outperforming state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: Unleashing the Potential of the Diffusion Model in Few-shot Semantic Segmentation
item.description: DiffewS: a novel framework leverages diffusion models for few-shot semantic segmentation, significantly outperforming existing methods in multiple settings.

item.title: Unsupervised Modality Adaptation with Text-to-Image Diffusion Models for Semantic Segmentation
item.description: Modality Adaptation with Diffusion Models (MADM) achieves state-of-the-art semantic segmentation by using pre-trained text-to-image diffusion models to enhance cross-modality capabilities and generate…

item.title: Upping the Game: How 2D U-Net Skip Connections Flip 3D Segmentation
item.description: Boosting 3D medical image segmentation, a novel U-shaped Connection (uC) integrates 2D U-Net skip connections into 3D CNNs, improving axial-slice plane feature extraction, surpassing state-of-the-art …

item.title: Where's Waldo: Diffusion Features For Personalized Segmentation and Retrieval
item.description: Unlocking personalized image retrieval and segmentation, a novel approach uses pre-trained text-to-image diffusion models to surpass supervised methods, addressing limitations of existing self-supervi…
